alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 06 at 1:14PM MST until November 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Schweitzer Mountain Road, Sandpoint, Athol, Eastport, Bonners Ferry, and Priest River. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
